class BatchRandTransform[source]

BatchRandTransform(p:Number=1.0, before_call:Callable[[Tensor | tuple[Tensor, ...], int], None] | None=None, **kwargs) :: DisplayedTransform

Randomly selects a subset of batch b to apply transform with per item probability p in before_call

Type Default Details
p Number 1.0 Probability of applying Transform to each batch item
before_call Callable[[Tensor or tuple[Tensor, ...], int], None] or None None Batch preprocessing function
kwargs No Content
